instructions: Open Settings . Select Personal Hotspot . Move the Personal Hotspot toggle switch to on/green. Note the Personal Hotspot password listed on this screen. If the default password is too hard to remember, you can change it by tapping it and entering a new one on the next screen. Tap Done to save the new password. Hotspot passwords must be at least eight characters. Your iPhone is now ready to connect to your iPad.
Tap Settings . Tap Wi-Fi . In the Personal Hotspots section, tap the name of your phone. Enter the password for the hotspot, if prompted. The password can be found in the menu on your iPhone.
